changelog.command_description: Display history of change applied to BaBot

known_issues.command_description: List of all issues in BaBot waiting to be fixed
known_issues.not_found: Th known issues list cannot be found

stats.title: Hi ! My name is {name}
stats.content:
I'm in **{servers_count}** servers
There is a total of **{shards_count}** shards running
You're on the shard **{shard}**
I'm actually handling **{total_players}** music players, and **{shard_players}** in your shard
I'm up since <t:{uptime}:R>
My server RAM usage : **{used_ram}/{total_ram}GB**
My server CPU load : **{cpu_usage}%**
My internal temperature : **{avg_temp}**¬∞C (avg) **{max_temp}**¬∞C (max)
stats.footer_text: Servers can sometimes be overloaded. Check here the servers status if you experience lags and feel free to report anormal values with /feedback

privacy.command_description: All legal actions that you can take on data stored by BaBot
privacy.embed_footer: For any questions concerning your data, contact our team at contact@theireply.fr

policy.description: Show how to access the Privacy Policy of BaBot
policy.embed_content:
You can consult the BaBot privacy policy in french [at this link](https://www.theireply.fr/babot/pdc.pdf)
*The english version is not yet available*

retrieve.description: Retreive all the data BaBot have about you
retrieve.embed_content:
An archive containing your data will be sent to you through your DMs immediately
**Are you sure you want to continue ?**
retrieve.success: Your data should have been send to you in DM
retrieve.fail: An error ocurred when generating the archive. There is probably no data to retrieve
retrieve.dm_message:
üóÉÔ∏è Your datas are available in the archive down below
‚ùïThis archive doesn't contains any executable files

delete.description: Delete all the data BaBot have about you
delete.embed_content:
**‚ö†Ô∏è All your data will be immediately deleted ‚ö†Ô∏è**
This includes :
- Your saved playlists
- Your recent activities on BaBot
- Your XP
- Your advantages if you've made a tip
**This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue ?**
delete.success: All your data have succesfully been deleted
delete.fail: It seems that an issue ocurred when deleting your data, please report it with `/feedback`

cancel.embed_content: Your request has been canceled. You can now safely close this popup

help.command_description: Get help about function of BaBot
help.level_description: Infos about how works the level system
help.donator_description: Why should you give some money for BaBot
help.faq_description: Get the answer to the common questions

dashboard.command_description: Show your personal BaBot control panel
dashboard.panel_description:
Here's your BaBot profile
Help about levels in available with the command `/help level`

settings.command_description: See and change your BaBot settings
settings.panel_content: - **Disable troll** : Limit the number of troll that you can receive from others users. Perfect if you have annoying friends
settings.not_authorized_user: ‚ùå As I can see, this is not your settings panel right ?

feedback.command_description: Send a feedback to the developer
feedback.modal_placeholder: Any positive or negative feedback are welcome !
feedback.submitted:
‚úÖ Thank you for your feedback !
Any return from users helps me to improve BaBot !

errors.user_banned: ‚ùå Sorry, you can't use {name}. Your account has been banned
errors.settings_panel_fail: ‚ùå The settings panel is currently broken :cry:
